branchCategory.name: North American Specifications
branchCategory.description: <p>Air Regulator manifold series ARM is available in standard size 1000 &amp; 2000 and the modular style is available in sizes 2500 &amp; 3000. Standard models are available with 4 connection methods and have backflow function availability. Modular styles can be freely mounted on a manifold station and have easy set up using the new handle.</p>
